profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Mechatronics engineer focused on development with more than a year and a half of experience as a Front-End developer using ReactJS, Nextjs and React Native, characterized me as a person who are constantly learning to improve my professional skills.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Development of web and mobile applications using ReactJS, Nextjs and React Native.
responsibilities: Develop webparts for the Sena platform using ReactJS.
Development of web pages using NextJS.
Mobile app development using React Native with Expo.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Development of functionalities and components using ReactJS, Material UI, Redux among others.
responsibilities: Development of features and components using ReactJS, Material UI, Redux among others.
I improve the user experience of the web application using ReactJS, Material UI, Redux among others.
I improve the source code of the web application using good programming practices such as SOLID principles.
I carry out steps to production of the web application.

jobs.title: Software Analyst
jobs.description: Development of procedures in PLSQL for process automation, web application development using Angular, NodeJS, Python, Docker, AWS
responsibilities: I make modifications in the database packages to add functions, so that the functionals can use them to carry out the different analyzes of the clients using PLSQL.
I develop functionality improvements to the company's administrative website using Angular.
Perform Lambda migrations made in Ruby to Python.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Development of web and mobile applications using ReactJS, Nextjs and React Native.
responsibilities: Development of web and mobile applications using ReactJS, Nextjs and React Native.

jobs.title: Front End Developer
jobs.description: Development of web applications, features, components and automated tests using ReactJS, Nextjs, Ant Design and Cypress.
responsibilities: I developed the payment web of the platform using the Wompi payment gateway through NextJS, of which I made use of the ROUTES APIs to create all the logic of the transaction and managing the state with Context and useReducer.
Perform automated tests using Cypress to verify correct platform functionality to any source code changes.
Develop new functionality such as anonymous user authentication using Firebase Auth.
Develop active user analytics using Firebase realtime for the platform.

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.description: Management of software development projects, development of web and mobile applications using ReactJS, Nextjs, React Native, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, Docker, AWS, Nest, among others.
responsibilities: Carry out the management and direction of the company's technological projects.
Developed the app for EazyFuels customers using React Native, plus integrated Redux to handle status and Open Pay to handle payments.
Develop web applications using ReactJS and NextJS as well as web pages using WordPress.
Deploy your web applications using Docker and AWS.

headData.title: Cristian Florez - Frontend Developer
headData.description: I am a Frontend Developer with more than two years of experience as a Front-End developer using ReactJS, Nextjs, React Native and Angular, characterized me as a person who is constantly learning to improve my professional skills.
headData.keys: Cristian Florez, Frontend Developer, ReactJS, Nextjs, React Native, Angular, Javascript, HTML, CSS, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, Docker, AWS, Nest, among others.
